MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: description: The {Binding} markup extension is converted at XAML load time into an instance of the Binding class. title: {Binding} markup extension' ms.assetid: 3BAFE7B5-AF33-487F-9AD5-BEAFD65D04C3

<object property="{Binding}" .../> -or- <object property="{Binding propertyPath}" .../> -or- <object property="{Binding bindingProperties}" .../> -or- <object property="{Binding propertyPath, bindingProperties}" .../>

LinkItem.internal_link_text: Properties of the Binding class that can be set with {Binding}

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block:
<Page ... > <Page.Resources> <local:S2Formatter x:Key="GradeConverter"/> </Page.Resources>
<Slider x:Name="sliderValueConverter" ... /> <TextBox Text="{Binding Path=Value, ElementName=sliderValueConverter, Mode=OneWay, Converter={StaticResource GradeConverter}}"/> </Page>
